leftSection_5.title: How to Apply for a Maid Visa in Dubai with One Nexuz

items.title: Conduct an Eligibility Check
items.description: We'll start with a brief discovery call to discuss your unique domestic worker needs and confirm visa eligibility.

items.title: Get an Entry Permit
items.description: Next, we'll ensure you meet Dubai’s maid visa requirements to secure an entry permit for your domestic help.

items.title: Complete Your Medical Test
items.description: We’ll assist your maid in completing a medical fitness test and Emirates ID biometrics for a seamless application.

items.title: Register with the MOHRE
items.description: Our expert consultants will register your employment contract with the MOHRE to protect you and your domestic help.

items.title: Attest & Submit Your Application
items.description: Next, we'll handle all the government coordination, secure visa stamps, and legalise your maid's employment status.

items.title: Receive Your Visa
items.description: Lastly, we'll set up a compliant WPS account and hand over all the documents, ensuring hassle-free processing.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does a maid visa process take?
items.answer: You can secure your maid visa within 1-14 days, depending on your selected jurisdiction and document readiness.

items.question: Can I sponsor someone already in the UAE with a maid visa?
items.answer: Yes, our expert PRO specialists can arrange a status change without requiring your domestic help to leave the country.

items.question: What are the minimum requirements to sponsor a maid in the UAE?
items.answer: To sponsor domestic help in the UAE, you'll have to ensure they're over 18, hold a valid work permit, and pass a medical fitness test.

items.question: What documents do I and my domestic worker need to secure a maid visa?
items.answer: Generally, you'll need your Emirates ID, tenancy contract, salary certificate, and passport copies of your maid to fast-track the maid visa process.

items.question: How long does a maid visa stay valid in the UAE?
items.answer: A maid visa stays valid for 2 years and can be renewed annually as long as you and your domestic help continue to meet the eligibility requirements.
